data.current_description: Lists sites that are failing in the Ad Experience Report on at least one platform.
data.summary_suggestion: List sites failing Ad Experience Report standards
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of sites that are currently failing Ad Experience Report standards on at least one platform. Returns a ViolatingSitesResponse containing sites with significant numbers of annoying ads that violate ad experience policies. Useful for identifying problematic publishers and monitoring ad quality compliance across platforms.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks context about what constitutes 'failing' (annoying ads/policy violations), what the response contains, and the practical use case. Added domain-specific terminology (ViolatingSitesResponse, ad experience policies) and clarified the business purpose for AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'adexperiencereport.sites.get' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary entirely. Description is too generic and lacks critical details: parameter format/requirements, response structure (SiteSummaryResponse with PlatformSummary objects), what metrics are included, and platform-specific data. Added parameter format guidance and response schema details to improve AI agent interpretability for proper operation invocation and result handling.

data.current_description: Gets a site's Ad Experience Report summary.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve Ad Experience Report summary for a site
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the Ad Experience Report summary for a specified site. Accepts a site name parameter in the format 'sites/{site}'. Returns a SiteSummaryResponse containing PlatformSummary data for each platform (desktop, mobile) showing ad experience metrics, violation status, and enforcement actions. Provides insights into a site's ad quality performance and compliance status.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely.
